text: Mary Ann Holzkamp was the Democratic mayor of Glen Cove, New York from 2002 to 2005. She was defeated by third party candidate Ralph V. Suozzi in the 2005 mayoral election. She was the city's first female mayor. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:New York (state) Democrats Category:Mayors of places in New York (state) Category:Women in New York (state) politics Category:Politicians from Glen Cove, New York
title: Mary Ann Holzkamp
